description.value:
Elaborate Banners worn sometimes by the Astartes that display Deathwatch Symbol and icons of Faith. Often as large as the Space marines themselves. When a Kill-Team's Leader spends a Fate Point to restore lose Cohesion, they restore one additional point if wearing this.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 15 R
